entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Risk of freezing rain over northern sections early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 at times late this evening and overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
